name: Network State Book Primer (2HRS)
description:
A primer for the Zuzalu community in advance of the Network State sessions. 

The goal of our time together is to provide a foundational introduction to the community so we can move into the weekend Network State sessions primed and ready to expand our impact as a community.

Agenda:
Summary of each chapter by leads, and discussion of application to Zuzalu
